awatharayakata nam eewa natha”yi wadala seka. 40 un wahanse mewadan kiya, thama ath ha pa owunta penwu seka. 41 owun prithiya nisa wishwasa nokota puduma wemin sitiya di, un wahanse owunta katha kota, ”kamata yamak mehi oba wetha thibe da”yi asu seka. 42 owhu badapu malu kallak un wahanseta piliganwu ha. 43 un wahanse eya piligena owun idiripita di walandu seka. 44 thawada un wahanse katha karamin, ”ma pilibanda mosesge wyawasthawaliyehi da diwasawaliyehi da githawaliyehi da liya athi hama deya ma ishta wiya yuthu yayi ma oba samanga sitiya di obata pawasu wachanayehi theruma me ya”yi wadala seka. 45 ewita un wahanse shuddha liyawilla owunta watahena pinisa owunge sith pahadawa katha kota, 46 ”mese kristhun wahanse wada windintath thun wana da malawungen nangitintath, 47 jerusalamen patangena sakala lokawasinta pasuthawi sith harawa ganima da paw kamawa da, un wahansege namayen prakasha karanu labannata da yuthu ma yayi liya atha. 48 oba me dewalata sakshikarayo wannahu ya. 49 balanna, mama mage piyanan wahansege poronduwa oba wetha genemi.
